system.requirements: Not Explorator, Kroot, or Ork. RT Rank 1+, one of Barter, Blather, Charm, Commerce, Scrutiny, or Enemy/Rival (Ecclesiarchy). Fellowship 35+ Benefitted from selling false religious items.

description.value:
A swindling individual who sees faith as an opportunity for manipulation. Be it selling fake charms, false visions, or the fast-talking predation on the suspicions and fears of the masses, all for their own benefit and all the while avoiding the ire of the Ecclesiarchy or other faithful individuals.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Drusian Charlatan Automatically Gain Enemy (Ecclesiarchy) if does not already have it. Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talent Cold Reading
